attributes.additional_details:
The media, the old Blairite Labour values and others do not want Corbyn. He is the only one who stands up for the people against the elitist groups who exploit us for our work and lives.
We the people have the power, if anything showed us that, it was the shock of leaving the EU. Lets vote in a person who can lead this in a positive direction for all people.
Someone who ties us together with Love and Care and does not set to divide us further for the benefit of the very rich.
attributes.background:
The MPs voted against him, lets show them how many MORE people NEED and WANT Corbyn to STAY Labour Party Leader.

"CORBYN IS FOR THE PEOPLE,
AND THE PEOPLE ARE FOR CORBYN."
‪#‎RedArmyCorbyn‬ ‬

After Brexit we cannot let them take the only person who provides Hope to this country.

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
